title: nAnAghiya AnandamE
sahitya:
nAnAghiya AnandamE nara vinai mATrum amarAmrtamE


anupallavi

  tEnAgi uLLE tittikkum uruvE dhyAna mantirattin mOna sadguruvE


caraNam    manaviruL mATrum dinakaranE vAyurai shollA mAyAviyE ghanamAna 
pAshak-kaLImbinai nIkki ghana mArgamAkkum cid-AkAshamAr viLakkE
